Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to allowable income deductions for determining income eligibility under the Senior Citizen Homeowners Exemption (SCHE).
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Allowable income deductions for determining income eligibility under the Senior Citizen Homeowners Exemption (SCHE).

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to rent increase exemptions for senior citizens.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Rent increase exemptions for senior citizens.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to allowable income deductions for determining income eligibility under the Senior Citizen Homeowners Exemption (SCHE).
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Allowable income deductions for determining income eligibility under the Senior Citizen Homeowners Exemption (SCHE).

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to rent increase exemptions for senior citizens.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Rent increase exemptions for senior citizens.
